page.title: 18Attitudes About the Area
page.content: 19 households were asked what they liked and what they disliked about living in the area.{ {What do you like about living here? The peace and quiet_7people. Freedom and independence_2people. Neighbourhood quality_3people. Challenge of the elements_1person. Know the people and the area well_2people. Other reasons given were the scenery, working with animals,the countryside. {What don't you like about living here? The bad weather_11people. The long winters_2people. The mist and fog_1person. Authorities like the Peak Park_2people.
